name: Abandoned Town House Escape
description:
Welcome to Abandoned Town House Escape - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Abandoned Town House Escape - a cool escape game?

Abandoned Town House Escape Game is another point and click room escape game
Developed by Bamvd.Com.Welcome back, escapers! Story of this game ,you want to
refresh your memory and go back to where everything started. You went to the
abandoned town house to collect memories even if you are alone. It was really nice to go
back for a while but it's time to go home. You looked around and everything seems so
different. The streets don't look the same anymore. This is why you find it hard to get
out of the place. It's almost night time and you don't want to stay here until the
darkness comes.The good thing is, you are still familiar with some places in this town
house and there are clues that can help you to escape. However, you still need to use your
logic to make the escape successful. Play this point n' click escape game and try to escape
as Thank you so much!.Are you ready? We’ll see it!. Good luck and have fun!

Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!


E-MAIL

Enjoy this fun adventure escape game!
